clauses.title: Features of the website are made available under a free software license
clauses.description: This case applies to services under licenses that are free as in "freedom". According to the Free Software Foundation, "free software is the software that grants the user the freedom to share, study, and modify it". Furthermore, the code is entirely open source and may be used without any restriction, including for commercial purposes.

case.text: Features of the website are made available under a free software license

clauses.title: You can access most of the pages on the service's website without revealing any personal information
clauses.description: The service does not require users to reveal personal information for most of its website. However, it may still collect anonymous logs.
clauses.clause_text: This information is anonymous and cannot be used to identify you.

case.text: You can access most of the pages on the service's website without revealing any personal information

clauses.title: Your personal data is used for limited purposes
clauses.description: Your Personal Data is only used for the essential purposes of the Service, which are clearly defined on the Agreements. For instance, the Service won't abuse your data to deliver targeted advertisements to you or for marketing purposes.
clauses.clause_text: Your privacy is taken very seriously as a FreeTube user. Your subscriptions, history, favorited videos, and settings are saved and stored locally on your machine.

case.text: Your personal data is used for limited purposes

clauses.title: You can delete your content from this service
clauses.description: You can ask the service to remove your content at any time, and it's deleted within a reasonable time.
clauses.clause_text: All information can be deleted at any time by the user by navigating to the settings page and deleting the information of thier choosing.

case.text: You can delete your content from this service

clauses.title: IP addresses of website visitors are not tracked
clauses.description: The Service disclaims that IP adresses from users are not collected (or anonymized) nor shared.
clauses.clause_text:
An anonymized IP is defined as an IP address that has the last 2 points imitted.
For example, if your IP address was 192.168.16.31, your IP will be logged as 192.168.0.0.

case.text: IP addresses of website visitors are not tracked

clauses.title: The cookies used by this service do not contain information that would personally identify you
clauses.description: The cookies used only collect anonymous, aggregated data that cannot be linked to a unique identity.
clauses.clause_text: This information is anonymous and cannot be used to identify you.

case.text: The cookies used by this service do not contain information that would personally identify you

clauses.title: Your personal data is not shared with third parties
clauses.description: Information collected from users by this service is not given to third parties.
clauses.clause_text: This data is never uploaded or saved to any server.

case.text: Your personal data is not shared with third parties

clauses.title: Only necessary logs are kept by the service to ensure quality
clauses.description: Logs are text files containing some information about web visitors, such as user agents (showing for instance that you're connecting from Firefox for Android) and ip addresses (which reveal your approximate location). This case applies to Services that only keep the strictly necessary logs on their servers and therefore protect your privacy.
clauses.clause_text: This information is anonymous and cannot be used to identify you.

case.text: Only necessary logs are kept by the service to ensure quality

clauses.title: Your browser's Do Not Track (DNT) headers are respected
clauses.description: This service does respect the browser's Do Not Track header and disables all user tracking if it is enabled.
clauses.clause_text: You can opt-out of these analytics by disabling JavaScript on your browser or by enabling the Do Not Track setting within your web browser.

case.text: Your browser's Do Not Track (DNT) headers are respected

clauses.title: Information is provided about how your personal data is used
clauses.description: The Privacy Policy explains the purposes for which data is collected and the way it is processed, used and shared.

case.text: Information is provided about how your personal data is used

clauses.title: Details are provided about what kind of information they collect
clauses.description: The Privacy Policy describes in detail the data collected through the website and through the services provided.

case.text: Information is provided about what kind of information they collect

clauses.title: The service is open-source
clauses.description: The code of the software is open-source and the users can have access to the source code.

clauses.title: No third-party analytics or tracking platforms are used
clauses.description: There are no Google Analytics or other tracking codes embedded in the service. Any tracking is performed by the service itself.
clauses.clause_text: Your privacy is very important, which is why this site runs without any JavaScript and does not use Google Analytics.

case.text: No third-party analytics or tracking platforms are used

clauses.title: Your personal data is not sold
clauses.description: This service makes an explicit promise not to sell "personal data" of users.
clauses.clause_text: This information will never be sent out or sold to third parties.

case.text: Your personal data is not sold

clauses.title: There is a date of the last update of the agreements
clauses.description: The given text has a date that allows to know when it was last updated.

case.text: There is a date of the last update of the agreements

clauses.title: First-party cookies are used
clauses.description: First-party cookies only belong to the domain of the service and not a third party.
clauses.clause_text: This website uses a self hosted instance of Matomo to track visitor statistics.
